item.title: Deakin Open Science Community
item.description: Deakin Open Science Community Deakin University is a young university spread across 4 campuses, in Burwood, Geelong, and Warnambool. The open science community at Deakin is primarily located at the Burwood campus and is eager to know open science advocates in the local area. We will be running a weekly “open science hacky hour” on the Burwood campus, so if you want to learn more about open science, find new ways to open up your work, or just want to meet some new people, let us know and come along.
